---@class battle_constant
local battle_constant<const> =
{
    ---获取数据时间间隔(毫秒)
    ---@type number
    GET_DATA_TIME_INTERVAL = 10,
    ---获取数据超时警告间隔(毫秒)
    ---@type number
    GET_DATA_TIMEOUT_WARNING_INTERVAL = 60 * 1000 * 1,

    ---异常技能UI显示时长(毫秒)
    ---@type number
    ABNORMAL_SKILL_UI_SHOW_TIME = 1000,
    
    ---@type string 战斗速度
    BATTLE_SPEED_UP_NUMBER_KEY = "BATTLE_SPEED_UP_NUMBER_KEY",

    ---@type string 战斗地图数据名字
    BATTLE_MAP_INFO_NAME = "BattleMapInfo",
    ---@type string 战斗偏移数据
    BATTLE_OFFSET_DATA_NAME = "BattleOffsetData",
    ---@type string 技能路径数据文件名
    SKILL_PATH_DATA_NAME = "SkillPathData",
    ---@type string Buff导演数据文件名
    BUFF_DIRECTOR_DATA_NAME = "BuffDirectorData",
    ---@type string 技能导演数据文件名
    SKILL_DIRECTOR_DATA_NAME = "SkillDirectorData",
    ---@type number 技能行为默认第一个id
    SKILL_BEHAVIOR_DEFAULT_ID = 100,
    
    ---@type string boss动画慢放事件点
    BOSS_BORN_IN_SLOW_EVENT = "boss_born_in_slow_event",

    ---@type string 战斗镜头升起事件名
    CAMERA_CAMERA_UP_EVENT = "camera_up",
    ---@type string 战斗镜头落下事件名
    CAMERA_CAMERA_DOWN_EVENT = "camera_down",

    ---@type string 战斗单位渲染层类名
    RENDER_BATTLE_UNIT = "render_battle_unit",
    ---@type string 战斗子弹渲染层类名
    RENDER_BATTLE_BULLET = "render_battle_bullet",
    ---@type string 战斗队伍渲染层类名
    RENDER_BATTLE_TEAM = "render_battle_team",
    ---@type string 战斗复活渲染层类名
    RENDER_BATTLE_REVIVE = "render_battle_revive",

    ---@type number 战斗消息系统1的id
    BATTLE_EFFECT_SYSTEM_1_ID = -999999,
    ---@type number 战斗消息系统1的id
    BATTLE_EFFECT_SYSTEM_2_ID = -999998,

    ---@type number 地图亮度通用倍数
    MAP_BRIGHTNESS_UNIVERSAL_VALUE = 1,
    ---@type number 地图亮度变暗倍数
    MAP_BRIGHTNESS_LESSEN_VALUE = 0.1,
    ---@type number 亮度改变持续时间
    MAP_BRIGHTNESS_DURATION_TIME = 0.5,
}

return battle_constant
